alert.note: Alert for McKenzie; Mountrail; Williams (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 9:14AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHERN MCKENZIE, WILLIAMS AND NORTHWESTERN MOUNTRAIL COUNTIES THROUGH 945 AM CDT/845 AM MDT/... At 913 AM CDT/813 AM MDT/, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles north of Tioga to near East Fairview. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 50 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Williston, Watford City, Tioga, Fairview, Ray, Alexander, Arnegard, Epping, Ross, Lostwood, Bonetrail, Fort Union Trading Post, East Fairview, Trenton, White Earth, Wheelock, Keene, Cartwright, Charbonneau, and White Earth Bay Recreation Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, seek shelter inside a building.
